ChangeList.Description: Removed the **secretReferenceValueId** property from the [omaSetting](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-omaSetting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **nfcBlocked** property from the [iosGeneralDeviceConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-iosGeneralDeviceConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **disconnectOnIdle** property from the [appleVpnConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-appleVpnConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **disconnectOnIdleTimerInSeconds** property from the [appleVpnConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-appleVpnConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the **dataProtectionBlockDirectMemoryAccess** property in the [windows10GeneralConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windows10GeneralConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.

Removed the **windowsPlatformBinaryTable** property from the [windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **simultaneousMultiThreading** property from the [windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-windows10DeviceFirmwareConfigurationInterface?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **advancedThreatProtectionRequiredSecurityLevel** property from the [macOSCompliancePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-macOSCompliancePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **getOmaSettingPlainTextValue** method from the [deviceConfiguration](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
